channel.title: Editing what comes up when players login
channel.description: um like i ran a server wanted to edit what the message said when players logged in and it says stuff like ownername is owner when in client.java i edited it to say Michael is owner anyone know how to fix?

item.title: Editing what comes up when players login
item.dc:creator: @Cooliomanz Cooliomanz
item.description:
@Cooliomanz wrote:

ok i forgot to compile it

Read full topic
item.source: Editing what comes up when players login

item.title: Editing what comes up when players login
item.dc:creator: @PulseX PulseX
item.description:
@PulseX wrote:

You need to compile it first, then close your running batch file, and re-open it to see the changes.

Read full topic
item.source: Editing what comes up when players login

item.title: Editing what comes up when players login
item.dc:creator: @Zelda_Knight Zelda Knight
item.description:
@Zelda_Knight wrote:

[quote=“myspaceman123, post:2, topic:225204”]you have to make a new public void and change the interface in that void
then you go to where it shows them logging in and change the old void to you new voids name and add ()

hopw this helps[/quote]

sigh
Why not just edit the current void?
Did you compiler?
Is there a serverCP?

Read full topic
item.source: Editing what comes up when players login

then you go to where it shows them logging in and change the old void to you new voids name and add ()

hopw this helps
